text: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا

translation.en.sahih: And they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that they would be for them [a source of] honor.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan mereka telah mengambil sembahan-sembahan selain Allah, agar sembahan-sembahan itu menjadi pelindung bagi mereka,
